about.welcome: Welcome to Atelier Mécanique, your trusted garage in Saint-Leonard.
about.moreThanJust: Where we pride ourselves on being more than just a car service center.
about.carEnthusiasts: We are a haven for car enthusiasts and a dedicated team of skilled mechanics.
about.mission: Our mission is clear: to keep your vehicles running smoothly and ensure your road safety.
about.countOnUs: Whether it's routine maintenance, repairs, or friendly advice, you can count on us for top-notch care.

contact.satisfactionPriority: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you face any issues with your vehicle, contact us today, and we'll provide the solutions you need.

services.offeredServicesDescription: At our garage, we take pride in offering a one-stop solution for all your automotive needs, delivering quality and reliability every time.
services.experienceDifference: Experience the difference of exceptional service

home.revitalizeRide: Revitalize your ride with expert care.
